description: Two storey side extension (following demolition of shed); alterations to front porch involving replacement of windows; single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear extension); rear roof extension incorporating Juliet balcony; installation of two rooflight to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Site Location Plan, Proposed Location Plan, SB/N 21 3 01 (Existing Ground Floor), SB/N 21 3 02 (Existing First Floor), SB/N 21 3 03 (Existing Roof Plan), SB/N 21 3 04 (Existing Section), SB/N 21 3 05 (Existing Rear Elevation), SB/N 22 4 19 (Existing Front Elevations), SB/N 21 3 06 (Existing Side Elevation), SB/N 22 3 07 (Proposed Ground Floor, Rev A 06.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 08 (Proposed First Floor, Rev A 03.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 09 (Proposed Second Floor), SB/N 22 3 10 (Proposed Front Elevation, Rev A 06.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 11 (Proposed Side Elevation, Rev A 06.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 12 (Proposed Rear Elevation, Rev A 03.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 13 (Proposed Section, Rev A 03.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 14 (Proposed Roof Plan), SB/N 22 3 15 (Proposed Section, Rev A 03.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 16 (Proposed Ground Floor Fire Regulations, Rev A 03.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 17 (Proposed First Floor Fire Regulations, Rev A 03.02.2023), SB/N 22 3 18 (Proposed Second Floor Fire Regulations).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The hereby approved two rooflights to front roof slope of the approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
